Alterna Caviar Repair RX Instant Recovery Shampoo-8. 5 oz. Alterna Caviar Repair Rx Instant Recovery Shampoo is a deeply reparative shampoo which reconstruct each individual strand of hair from the inside out to rebuild resurface and restore hair leaving strands strong healthy smooth shiny fully restored. Key product benefits are derived from Strand-Building Proteins which target damage at the microscopic level working to repair each individual strand of hair : REBUILDS: this unique ingredient blend delivers essential nutrients to the hair s interior cortex nourishing to help strengthen strands. Fills in gaps tears in the damaged cuticle reconstructing this protective layer to ensure that nutrients do not escape. Cements the newly constructed exterior cuticle to the interior cortex ensuring that the scales of the hair lay flat. RESURFACES: Seals and reinforces the cuticle layer with a defensive shield that strengthens the strand to increase resistance to breakage while infusing hair with vital antioxidants to help prevent free radical penetration and other damage from occurring. RESTORES: Leaves strands fully restored to their healthy pre-damaged state. Hair is stronger smoother softer and shinier. Color Hold reg : A proprietary color protection complex found in all Alterna products that provides the highest level of color protection from color fade caused by UVA UVB and visible light rays - including artificial light sources. Enzymetherapy reg : A core Alterna technology found in each of our products. Helps to transform ingredients into a micro-structure that the hair can more easily absorb allowing for deeper more targeted penetration of active ingredients. Age-Control Complex reg : Caviar Extract Vitamin C Cytokines to fight natural chemical environmental aging. Seasilk reg : A blend of marine botanicals that provides exceptional moisture and helps repair damaged hair.
